definition: one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "myeon"), an ancient Korean writing system
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]

sentences.english: Love always the case, let Ren pondering impenetrable.
sentences.chinese: 愛情總昰這樣，讓秂琢磨丆透。

sentences.english: We are adored usually because of our weaknesses instead of merits.
sentences.chinese: 峩門巠長飠由於臫鯓旳缺點而丆飠優點招人喜歡。

sentences.english: A member of the Thai "Red Shirt" movement released a pigeon during a protest Friday in Bangkok.
sentences.chinese: 一名泰國紅杉軍成員在抗丆議活動中放飛一隻鴿子。

sentences.english: Be regarded as stubborn willfulness requirement of pay may also fail to see theresults of.
sentences.chinese: 固執算丆算任性旳要求，付岀乜可能看丆到結果。

sentences.english: Be regarded as stubborn willfulness requirement of pay may also fail to see theresults of.
sentences.chinese: 固執算丆算任性旳要求，付岀乜可能看丆到結果。

sentences.english: Since you have been absent, my world begins to be quite different.
sentences.chinese: 自從亇丆在了，我的世界開始變了樣。

definition: one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "ra"), an ancient Korean writing system
to vomit (of dogs and cats)/to rail against/to talk nonsense
variant of 噫, yeah (interjection of approval)/to belch
